headline.main: Obama Names Cyber Experts From Business, Academia to New Panel
headline.print_headline: Obama Names Cyber Experts From Business, Academia to New Panel

docs.snippet: The chief executive of MasterCard Inc, the former head of the National Security Agency and officials from Microsoft and Uber will join a commission to strengthen U.S. cyber defenses, the White House said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The chief executive of MasterCard Inc, the former head of the National Security Agency and officials from Microsoft and Uber will join a commission to strengthen U.S. cyber defenses, the White House said on Wednesday.

headline.main: NASCAR to Use Heat Races for Xfinity Series Race at Bristol
headline.print_headline: NASCAR to Use Heat Races for Xfinity Series Race at Bristol

docs.snippet: In a gimmick move intended to add excitement to the show, NASCAR will use heat races for the first time in the Xfinity Series on Saturday at Bristol Motor Speedway....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a gimmick move intended to add excitement to the show, NASCAR will use heat races for the first time in the Xfinity Series on Saturday at Bristol Motor Speedway.

headline.main: U.S. Rights Report Criticizes China's 'Severe' Crackdown on Lawyers
headline.print_headline: U.S. Rights Report Criticizes China's 'Severe' Crackdown on Lawyers

docs.snippet: The U.S. State Department's annual human rights report on Wednesday criticized Beijing's 'severe' crackdown against Chinese lawyers and law firms handling cases that Beijing considers politically sensitive....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. State Department's annual human rights report on Wednesday criticized Beijing's 'severe' crackdown against Chinese lawyers and law firms handling cases that Beijing considers politically sensitive.

headline.main: Swiss Re, Legal & General Set to Bid for Deutsche's Abbey Life-Sources
headline.print_headline: Swiss Re, Legal & General Set to Bid for Deutsche's Abbey Life-Sources

docs.snippet: Britain's Legal & General Group PLC and Swiss Re AG are among firms said to be weighing bids for Deutsche Bank AG's Abbey Life Assurance Co, sources familiar with the matter said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's Legal & General Group PLC and Swiss Re AG are among firms said to be weighing bids for Deutsche Bank AG's Abbey Life Assurance Co, sources familiar with the matter said.

headline.main: Dancers in Madonna’s ‘Truth or Dare’ Had Truths of Their Own
headline.print_headline: Madonna’s ‘Truth or Dare’ Dancers Had Truths of Their Own

docs.snippet: The documentary “Strike a Pose” looks back at the men featured in the 1991 film, which aimed to be revealing but kept their secrets....
docs.abstract: Reijer Zwaan and Ester Gould documentary film Strike a Pose tells story of several young men who achieved fame as backup dancers in Madonna's 1990 Blonde Ambition tour and 1991 movie Truth or Dare while hiding fact that they were gay or HIV-positive.
docs.lead_paragraph: The documentary “Strike a Pose” looks back at the men featured in the 1991 film, which aimed to be revealing but kept their secrets.

docs.snippet: Hundreds of pages of internal Takata documents and emails examined by The New York Times reveal new details about how economic pressures helped guide the company’s handling of its airbag defect, which has been linked to at least 11 deaths and mo...
docs.lead_paragraph: Hundreds of pages of internal Takata documents and emails examined by The New York Times reveal new details about how economic pressures helped guide the company’s handling of its airbag defect, which has been linked to at least 11 deaths and more than 100 injuries.

headline.main: Charges of U.S. Maid Held Captive Due to 'Cultural Confusion,' Lawyer Says
headline.print_headline: Charges of U.S. Maid Held Captive Due to 'Cultural Confusion,' Lawyer Says

docs.snippet: A Southern California couple accused of forcing an Indonesian woman to work as an unpaid live-in maid are victims of "cultural confusion," their attorney said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Southern California couple accused of forcing an Indonesian woman to work as an unpaid live-in maid are victims of "cultural confusion," their attorney said on Wednesday.
